name: Robo Prison Mayhem
description:
Robo Prison Mayhem

Robo Prison Mayhem is a top down shooter, where the protagonist tries to survive incoming waves of robot guards, using his upgradable weapon and a gravity beam. The game takes place in an intergalactic prison during a prison riot. Gather gold to upgrade your weapon and heal yourself by eating a delicious pack of ramen noodles.

Make sure to enable "Shoot Effect" on Options Panel for better experience!

* Controls *

  • Move (W,A,S,D)
  • Toggle Move/Run (Space)
  • Fire/Throw Item (Left Click)
  • Pick Up/ Place Item (Right Click)
  • Pause Game (P)
